mapper.update: update tb_orderinfo set order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, receiving_address = #{receivingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiving_man = #{receivingMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiving_phone = #{receivingPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_remark = #{orderRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deliver_goods_date = #{deliverGoodsDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_state = #{payState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_date = #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_id, order_time, receiving_address, receiving_man, receiving_phone, goods_name, goods_id, order_remark, order_state, deliver_goods_date, pay_state, pay_date from tb_orderinfo where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select order_id, order_time, receiving_address, receiving_man, receiving_phone, goods_name, goods_id, order_remark, order_state, deliver_goods_date, pay_state, pay_date from tb_orderinfo
